column3: Seems like this leaves people with no obvious way to set a comment, since our param parsing doesn't treat null as omitted. :/

> Seems like this leaves people with no obvious way to set a comment, since our param parsing doesn't treat null as omitted. :/

That should change after #8811, as it also uses null to mark omitted parameters. In any case this is a documentation change only, so I don't see why that should be a blocker here.
utACK ce370c1
